meanings.sent1: The angulose table had sharp corners that could easily poke someone.
meanings.sent2: The angulose rocks jutted out from the ground at odd angles.
meanings.sent3: The angulose puzzle piece refused to fit into the smooth edge, causing frustration.
meanings.sent4: Her angulose personality clashed with his easygoing nature.
meanings.sent5: The angulose shadows cast by the streetlights created a mysterious atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Formed with angles or sharp corners.
meanings.sent1: The angulose building stood out among the round structures in the city.
meanings.sent2: The angulose design of the chair made it uncomfortable to sit on for long periods.
meanings.sent3: The angulose cake slices were difficult to cut evenly for the party.
meanings.sent4: His angulose handwriting made it hard to read his notes.
meanings.sent5: The angulose pattern on the rug added a modern touch to the room.

meanings.sent1: The angulose cloud formation looked like a giant triangle in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The angulose branches of the tree reached out in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The angulose costume made him look like a walking geometry lesson.
meanings.sent4: Her angulose haircut gave her a unique and edgy look.
meanings.sent5: The angulose pattern on her dress made her stand out in the crowd.
